ygData.subject: Re: Karana what to hunt
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm, if you are talking about the ogre shaman camp.....stay the hell away unless you have a big high 30s group.....the chief is 35th lvl and very mean. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Umm, if you are talking about the ogre shaman camp.....stay the hell away unless you have a big high 30s group.....the chief is 35th lvl and very mean.

>>> Kelly Pruett <pruett@...> 5.21.99 1:34:42 PM >>>
From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>



There is also an ogre camp on the northeast side of the map. About 3 to 5 ogres
of various sizes and classes. Probably random like the bandits. I did encounter
one hill giant there once. He was crossing the small mountain between the ogre
camp and a remote shop that I like to sell loot to. If I remember correctly it
only took him three hits to pound me into the ground. The lesson here is to be
careful out there....

-Faderic
